MiniTimer module

class MiniTimer.MiniTimer[source]

Bases: object

A simple timer class for measuring elapsed time in nanoseconds.

This class provides methods to start a timer, get the elapsed time since the timer was started, and get the current time in nanoseconds.

get_ellapsed_time() → int[source]

Calculates and returns the elapsed time in nanoseconds since the timer was started.

Returns:

The elapsed time in nanoseconds.

Return type:

int

get_time() → int[source]

Returns the current time in nanoseconds.

Returns:

The current time in nanoseconds.

Return type:

int

start_time()[source]

Starts or restarts the timer by recording the current time in nanoseconds.
